url.imageAlt: An old newspaper clipping that shows the caption “The Remodelled Empire Theatre” and a photo of the theatre itself

description: In 1913, the first professional male impersonator to perform in Windsor was Ollie Chapoton, here at the Empire Theatre. The address was 13 Pitt before 1916, but was changed to 39 Pitt in the 1930s. The building was later torn down in 1958.
